limit.description: The maximum number of events to return.

types.description: A list of event types to include. If this list is absent then all event types are included.

not_types.description: A list of event types to exclude. If this list is absent then no event types are excluded.

senders.description: A list of senders IDs to include. If this list is absent then all senders are included.

not_senders.description: A list of sender IDs to exclude. If this list is absent then no senders are excluded.

rooms.description: A list of room IDs to include. If this list is absent then all rooms are included.

not_rooms.description: A list of room IDs to exclude. If this list is absent then no rooms are excluded.
